short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate Links for xontel PBX, This Extension only for Xontel Customers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
XonTel PBX Managers

- Create Configuration link to XonTel Application.
- Open the generated links on mobile to get the app configured with the generated Extension.
